version_description: We've tinkered with the app to boost its performance. Enjoy the best experience of booking an Ola ride by updating to the latest version.
We've tinkered with the app to boost its performance. Enjoy the best experience of booking an Ola ride by updating to the latest version.

Unveiling an all-new way to discover and learn all about your favorite Ola rides. From specific car models to unique features of each ride type, we've collated all the interesting tidbits you need to choose and book a ride. Simply double-tap or long press on a ride category to know more.

What's more? We've cleaned up a few bugs on the windshield of the app and improved the overall performance. Check it out!

Unveiling an all-new way to discover and learn all about your favorite Ola rides. From specific car models to unique features of each ride type, we've collated all the interesting tidbits you need to choose and book a ride. Simply double-tap or long press on a ride category to know more.

What's more? We've cleaned up a few bugs on the windshield of the app and improved the overall performance. Check it out!
A lot has changed since our last update. You draw better performance, find fewer bugs, and enjoy a seamless booking experience. Download it now!
A lot has changed since our last update. You draw better performance, find fewer bugs, and enjoy a seamless booking experience. Download it now!

"Start your Diwali celebrations by downloading the latest version of our app. It's cleaner, faster, and more efficient than ever before.
Get it now so that you can find and book a ride faster and spend more time to enjoy festivities with your loved ones."

"Start your Diwali celebrations by downloading the latest version of our app. It's cleaner, faster, and more efficient than ever before.
Get it now so that you can find and book a ride faster and spend more time to enjoy festivities with your loved ones."
• Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

The winter's coming. You need all the help you can get to arrive quickly at your destination. Here's what's new in our latest update.

• Feature enhancements and performance measures to help you book a ride faster
• A few itsy-bitsy bugs have been shooed away

Download now for the best booking experience.

The winter's coming. You need all the help you can get to arrive quickly at your destination. Here's what's new in our latest update.

• Feature enhancements and performance measures to help you book a ride faster
• A few itsy-bitsy bugs have been shooed away

Download now for the best booking experience.
Add more fun and less glum to your daily commute with our latest update. Comes with more performance tweaks that will further improve your ride booking experience. Try it now!
Add more fun and less glum to your daily commute with our latest update. Comes with more performance tweaks that will further improve your ride booking experience. Try it now!

Here's a brand new update to jump-start your new year's journey! We peeped under the hood of our app, rolled up our sleeves and fine-tuned the experience for you to bring you our first update of 2018.

With this update, we're now ready for the iPhone X experience! See the Ola app fit seamlessly on the edge-to-edge screen of an iPhone X and enjoy an unparalleled ride booking experience.

The app is now faster and smoother than ever before. Download now and take it for a spin.

What's new in 4.5.8

Here's a brand new update to jump-start your new year's journey! We peeped under the hood of our app, rolled up our sleeves and fine-tuned the experience for you to bring you our first update of 2018.

With this update, we're now ready for the iPhone X experience! See the Ola app fit seamlessly on the edge-to-edge screen of an iPhone X and enjoy an unparalleled ride booking experience.

The app is now faster and smoother than ever before. Download now and take it for a spin.
• Bug fixes and feature enhancements.
• Bug fixes and feature enhancements.
To help you get on the road faster, we've boosted the performance of the app with hard-to-find bug fixes. Download the latest version of the app to try it for yourself.
To help you get on the road faster, we've boosted the performance of the app with hard-to-find bug fixes. Download the latest version of the app to try it for yourself.

Introducing new payment options for Share Pass & Ola Select:
We heard you when you said you wanted more payment options to buy Share Pass and Ola Select. Along with Ola Money, you can now also use your cards & net banking to buy your next Share Pass and Ola Select subscription.

We've squeezed out some more joy for you by fixing a few trifling bug issues that hardly ever bothered you.

Introducing new payment options for Share Pass & Ola Select:
We heard you when you said you wanted more payment options to buy Share Pass and Ola Select. Along with Ola Money, you can now also use your cards & net banking to buy your next Share Pass and Ola Select subscription.

We've squeezed out some more joy for you by fixing a few trifling bug issues that hardly ever bothered you.
• Bug fixes and improvements.
• Bug fixes and improvements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

• Easier to use safety feature
Just tap the Emergency button at your fingertips to get instant help. Also, quickly alert your emergency contacts.

• Change your Ola Wi-Fi password
Love auto-connecting to Ola Wi-Fi in your every ride? Now you can set your preferred Wi-Fi password from profile settings. Psst... use a strong password!

• Easier to use safety feature
Just tap the Emergency button at your fingertips to get instant help. Also, quickly alert your emergency contacts.

• Change your Ola Wi-Fi password
Love auto-connecting to Ola Wi-Fi in your every ride? Now you can set your preferred Wi-Fi password from profile settings. Psst... use a strong password!

Since you can’t teleport to work or to meet your friends (as it’s still not 2129 yet!), we needed to make the Ola app faster for you. So, what did we do? We rolled up our sleeves and peeped under the hood. We found a few harmless bugs that we politely shooed away. It’s your turn to update your Ola app for a seamless ride booking experience.

Since you can’t teleport to work or to meet your friends (as it’s still not 2129 yet!), we needed to make the Ola app faster for you. So, what did we do? We rolled up our sleeves and peeped under the hood. We found a few harmless bugs that we politely shooed away. It’s your turn to update your Ola app for a seamless ride booking experience.
• Bug fixes and feature enhancements.
• Bug fixes and feature enhancements.

Introducing Ola Pedal
• Get around your neighborhood in an eco-friendly way using bicycles. Available only in select locations.

Ola Play
• Browse curated playlists & radio channels while waiting for a Prime Play ride & play them directly from the app during a ride.
• Play your own music in a ride. Connect to car’s stereo via Bluetooth & enjoy your music.

Introducing Ola Pedal
• Get around your neighborhood in an eco-friendly way using bicycles. Available only in select locations.

Ola Play
• Browse curated playlists & radio channels while waiting for a Prime Play ride & play them directly from the app during a ride.
• Play your own music in a ride. Connect to car’s stereo via Bluetooth & enjoy your music.

We’ve fine-tuned the machinery and improved the experience for you in this version of the app. It is faster, smarter, and easier to use than ever before.

Love using the Ola app? Remember to rate the app and share your encouraging feedback for us.

In our quest to make your every journey better, we constantly make feature improvements on the app. We have shown the door to a few piffling bugs and improved the overall experience for you in this update.

Tap the update button to download the latest version of the Ola app.

We bring you a faster new version of your favorite ride booking app. Upgrade to the newest version of the app for an enhanced booking experience.

Love the app? Remember to rate us and leave your review.

Welcome July with a new version of the Ola app! Get ready to enjoy a superior ride booking experience. We've freed the app of a few pesky bugs that had crept in and made it even more easy to use for you. Go ahead, download the latest version of the app and take it for a spin!

Welcome July with a new version of the Ola app! Get ready to enjoy a superior ride booking experience. We've freed the app of a few pesky bugs that had crept in and made it even more easy to use for you. Go ahead, download the latest version of the app and take it for a spin!

In this update:
• We’ve boosted the app’s performance with some nifty upgrades
• We’ve shown the door to a bunch of unwelcome homely bugs that had found their way in the app

In this update:
• We’ve boosted the app’s performance with some nifty upgrades
• We’ve shown the door to a bunch of unwelcome homely bugs that had found their way in the app

We have fueled up the app with a new update to offer you a faster, smoother and better ride booking experience. Download it now and take it for a spin.

Love the updated Ola app? Remember to rate the app and share your feedback with us.

We have fueled up the app with a new update to offer you a faster, smoother and better ride booking experience. Download it now and take it for a spin.

Love the updated Ola app? Remember to rate the app and share your feedback with us.

Open the Ola app, book a ride, and travel to new or familiar places in an Ola. In this update, we found a few bugs to smite, gave the app a thorough scrub and tweaked its performance.

Enjoy great benefits like offers, affordable fares, high-quality rides, security features, and more. Download the latest version of the Ola app.

Open the Ola app, book a ride, and travel to new or familiar places in an Ola. In this update, we found a few bugs to smite, gave the app a thorough scrub and tweaked its performance.

Enjoy great benefits like offers, affordable fares, high-quality rides, security features, and more. Download the latest version of the Ola app.

We have arrived at your doorstep with the latest version of your favorite ride booking app. Try out the polished new app that is laden with new performance-boosters.

Unlock exciting rewards. Invite your friends to try Ola and earn rewards in return.
Loved your previous Ola ride? Share your love by rating us and writing your review.

We have arrived at your doorstep with the latest version of your favorite ride booking app. Try out the polished new app that is laden with new performance-boosters.

Unlock exciting rewards. Invite your friends to try Ola and earn rewards in return.
Loved your previous Ola ride? Share your love by rating us and writing your review.

In this update:
- We’ve shooed away a few pesky bugs. Good riddance.
- We took the app for a maintenance run & made performance enhancements. Give it a try.

Help Kerala recover
Our heart goes out to our friends in Kerala who’re trying to rebuild their lives in the aftermath of floods. Here's how you can help:
You can donate Rs 5 on your every Ola ride. Turn on the donation from ‘Your account’.
Based out of India? Visit https://donation.cmdrf.kerala.gov.in/ to see how you can help.

Foodpanda is now on Ola!
Now order your favourite food from the best restaurants in the city on your Ola app. Update your Ola app for amazing food experiences.

Join Foodpanda’s Crave Party on Ola: The biggest food party is in town. And you're invited. Enjoy desserts at just ₹9, all day snacks starting at ₹19, biryani starting at ₹79 and more exclusive deals on your Ola app.

(Foodpanda is available on the Ola app for a select few users. Stay tuned as we bring Foodpanda to more Ola users.)

Yes, we’re always listening. Your feedback goes a long way in shaping up the Ola app. With every new update, we try to make your experience more delightful than the last one.

So don’t forget to share your ratings and reviews on the app store. Update your app now to get the latest from Ola.

Introducing Prime SUV XL for Outstation:
Presenting the perfect ride for your Christmas & New Year’s holiday! Now book super spacious SUVs right from your Ola app for comfortable Outstation family trips.
Tap Outstation in your Ola app & choose the Prime SUV XL category to book. Available only in select cities for now.

Wait, there’s more...
We’ve cleaned the bugs in the attic & made a few performance enhancements in the app.

Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!

Introducing Prime SUV XL for Outstation:
Presenting the perfect ride for your Christmas & New Year’s holiday! Now book super spacious SUVs right from your Ola app for comfortable Outstation family trips.
Tap Outstation in your Ola app & choose the Prime SUV XL category to book. Available only in select cities for now.

Wait, there’s more...
We’ve cleaned the bugs in the attic & made a few performance enhancements in the app.

Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!

You can now pay for your Ola rides using credit/debit cards and UPI. Here’s how.

- Add your card or UPI ID as a payment option
- Book a ride using one of these cashless payment options
- Complete the payment when prompted to enjoy a truly cashless experience

You can now pay for your Ola rides using credit/debit cards and UPI. Here’s how.

- Add your card or UPI ID as a payment option
- Book a ride using one of these cashless payment options
- Complete the payment when prompted to enjoy a truly cashless experience
